alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 3:16PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Helena Parish, west central Pike and eastern Amite Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 315 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Easleyville, or 11 miles northwest of Greensburg, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Magnolia, Gillsburg, Easleyville and Mccomb Airport. This includes Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 6 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
